content: Successfully removed all references to the deleted claude_pm.services.memory_service module
actions_taken: Fixed import error in claude_pm/collectors/framework_services.py - replaced with SERVICE REMOVED status
Updated claude_pm/scripts/service_manager.py - commented out MemoryService instantiation and registration
Updated project service dependencies - removed memory_service dependency
Fixed test file claude_pm/tests/test_connection_fixes.py - commented out memory_service import and usage
Updated deployment commands - removed memory_service from service lists
Updated version utilities - removed memory_service from SERVICE_VERSION_FILES
Updated version loader - removed memory_service from service lists
alternatives_documented: Native memory service integration via mem0AI
recommendations: Update documentation to reflect memory_service removal
Consider implementing unified memory interface using mem0AI directly
Review test files for any remaining memory_service references
Update deployment scripts to reflect service architecture changes
